summary: Adds Dominion dialogue to the interaction with Tsun in Sovngarde. A step to properly roleplaying as a member of the Thalmor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds dialogue to the interaction with Tsun in Sovngarde.

Now when he asks you by what right you can pass, you can answer in a wholesomely thalmor way.

As bonuses, I have added a few things for your enjoyment in Markarth as well as a series of thalmor oriented handbills at the Embassy.Â  Keep in mind that this is still in Beta, and will be improved upon.

The eventual Goal is to create a mod that will add more immersion and interest to the Thalmor, culminating in a quest unique to the faction. Let me know in case of any bugs or such.

To that end I am looking for people to help me out with fleshing out the various questlines. PM me and I'll get back to you :).

NOTE: You'll find the books ontop Rulindil's table and on the floor as you enter Elenwen's Solar.
author: Me
